chaupais.text: सखा धर्ममय अस रथ जाकें। जीतन कहँ न कतहुँ रिपु ताकें॥
chaupais.meaning: O friend, the one whose chariot is made entirely of dharma has no enemy that can defeat them.

chaupais.text: अब कछु नाथ न चाहिये मोरे, दीन दयाल अनुग्रह तोरे॥
chaupais.meaning: O Lord, I desire nothing now. Your grace alone is enough for this poor soul.

chaupais.text: बन्दउँ नाम राम रघुवर को। हेत प्रीति सुर सरेस रघुकुल को॥
chaupais.meaning: I bow to the name of Ram, the beloved of all divine beings and the pride of the Raghu lineage.
